Package com.jjjwelectronics.scanner

Class AbstractBarcodeScanner

java.lang.Object
com.jjjwelectronics.AbstractDevice<BarcodeScannerListener>
com.jjjwelectronics.scanner.AbstractBarcodeScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDevice<BarcodeScannerListener>, IBarcodeScanner
Direct Known Subclasses:
BarcodeScanner
abstract class AbstractBarcodeScanner extends AbstractDevice<BarcodeScannerListener> implements IBarcodeScanner
Abstract base class for barcode scanners.
Author:
JJJW Electronics LLP

  • Method Details

    • scan

      public void scan(BarcodedItem item)
      Description copied from interface: IBarcodeScanner
      Simulates the customer's action of scanning an item. The result of the scan is only announced to any registered observers. Requires power.
      Specified by:
      scan in interface IBarcodeScanner
      Parameters:
      item - The item to scan. Of course, it will only work if the item has a barcode, and maybe not even then.
